files.template: const express = require('express'); const crypto = require('crypto'); const app = express(); app.use(express.raw({type:'*/*'})); app.post('/square', (req,res)=>{ const sig=req.headers['x-square-hmacsha256-signature']; const h=crypto.createHmac('sha256', process.env.SQUARE_WEBHOOK_SECRET).update(req.body).digest('base64'); res.status(sig===h?200:401).send('ok'); }); app.listen(3000);
